snippet.title: Spell Casting Meowgically Enhanced Edition Trailer 1
snippet.description:
http://gordgames.itch.io/spell-casting

There once was a cat, just like you I see,
A Wizard they most of all wanted to be.

But the Wizard's school was so far away,
A distant travel to a great stone chalet.

But hark, what is this, arrived in the mail?
A Book and a Wand from some fairytail!

An orb, a hat, and a flowing red robe!
No need at all to travel the globe!

Learn Spells at home via Distance Education!
A Wizard soon will be your vocation!

Spell Casting is a family friendly line drawing puzzle game in which you are a young wizard learning spells in the comfort of your home thanks to Wizardly Distance Education!

Practice casting spells by tracing out the patterns in the spell books using your mouse. Earn a 3 star rating in each spell to unlock the exam.

You'll need to remember the previously learned spell shapes to pass the exam and unlock new spell books! 

http://gordonlittle.ca/

Featuring the voice of Christer Kaitila (@McFunkypants) and the music of Benjamin Burnes (@ben_burnes).
